body_html:
You need to include the Eigen3 (from eigen.tuxfamily.org) library in the -I for your target. From CMake it is something like:

find_package(Eigen3)
add_executable(...)
target_include_directories(<target> INTERFACE ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})
body_text:
You need to include the Eigen3 (from eigen.tuxfamily.org) library in the -I for your target. From CMake it is something like:
find_package(Eigen3)
add_executable(...)
target_include_directories(<target> INTERFACE ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})
body:
You need to include the Eigen3 (from eigen.tuxfamily.org) library in the -I for your target. From CMake it is something like:
```
find_package(Eigen3)
add_executable(...)
target_include_directories(<target> INTERFACE ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})
```
